mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Griffith , Orlando
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Marshfield, Athens Co., O [Marshfield, Athens County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Griffith , Orlando Patient Age: 19. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot flesh wound of back. Conical bullet entered gluteii [gluteal] muscles about 2 and one half inches posterior to trochanter major passing transversly over the sacrum lodging about posterior to trochanter of right side. Bullet extracted at Winchester. Surgeon unknown. Location Wounded: Cedar Creek, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/10/19. Nature of Wound: Conical bullet. Result: Furloughed 1864/12/13. Returned to duty .
